ref: 9438 bhājya ʻ to be divided ʼ Siddhāntaś. [√bhaj2]

L. bhāj m. ʻ threshing floor ʼ (where the grain is divided out), bhājaṛ m. ʻ heap of grain collected for threshing (and subsequent division) ʼ, (Ju.) bhājaṛ m. ʻ threshing floor ʼ, bhāj̄ī f. ʻ share of food given at marriages, present, contribution ʼ.
